Actions.Text: HELD FOR CONSIDERATION IN GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the purchase or lease of zero emission vehicles for state-owned vehicle fleets
Summary: Restricts the application of requirements in any procurement for the manufacturing or retrofitting of zero emission vehicles and charging or fueling infrastructure that the components and parts used or supplied in the performance of the contract or any subcontract thereto shall be produced or made in whole or substantial part in the United States to align with federal domestic procurement preferences and exemptions with respect thereto.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the purchase or lease of zero emission vehicles for state-owned vehicle fleets
